message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it.
I appreciate the offer, but $120 is a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $85 for it.  What do you think?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm thinking $105 is a fair price for this product.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $105 is still a bit too high for me.  I'm willing to go up to $95.  Let's make this happen.
I'm not willing to go any lower than $105, but I'm willing to meet you halfway again. I'll do $100.50
